definition: total defeat of an army (idiom); fig. a complete wipeout
the (communist) party and the army together (idiom)

sentences.english: The whole army begins to clamour for the fos se to be filled up.
sentences.chinese: 全军都开始叫嚷着要将壕堑填平。

sentences.english: Within a short while the 13th Army Group was completely wiped out, with all its troops surrendered.
sentences.chinese: 第十三兵团随即全军覆没，所属部队全部投降。

sentences.english: When Tou king of Hamath heard that David had defeated the whole army of Hadadezer, king of Zobah.
sentences.chinese: 哈马王陀乌听见大卫杀败琐巴王哈大利谢的全军。

sentences.english: The whole Babylonian army, under the commander of the imperial guard, broke down the walls around Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 跟从护卫长迦勒底的全军就拆毁耶路撒冷四围的城墙。

sentences.english: The whole army began to clamour for the fosse to be filled up.
sentences.chinese: 全军都开始叫嚷著要将壕堑填平。

sentences.english: When David heard of it, he sent Joab and all the army of the mighty men.
sentences.chinese: 大卫听见了，就差派约押统带勇猛的全军出去。

sentences.english: The whole army began to clamour for the fosse to be filled up.
sentences.chinese: 全军都开始叫嚷着要将壕堑填平。

sentences.english: Department of Orthopaedic Surgery, the Radboud University Nijmegen Medical Centre, Nijmegen, the Netherlands.
sentences.chinese: 第四军医大学唐都医院全军骨科中心。

sentences.english: Youre the best-trained, least-proven battalion in this whole army.
sentences.chinese: 你们练习有素，但在全军却很少被认知。

sentences.english: And when David heard of it, he sent Joab, and all the host of the mighty men.
sentences.chinese: 大卫听见了，就差派约押统带勇猛的全军出去。

sentences.english: God has given the Midianites and the whole camp into his hands.
sentences.chinese: 神已将米甸和全军都交在他的手中。

sentences.english: In the Majiang Battle between China and France, Chinese Fujian Sea Fleet was almost annihilated.
sentences.chinese: 在中法马江之战中，中国的福建舰队几乎全军覆没。

sentences.english: Gu five personally to kill, destroy Turkic army.
sentences.chinese: 顾小五亲自上阵杀敌，突厥全军履灭。

sentences.english: "Even though he might've known they were going to be massacred, " amended Puller.
sentences.chinese: “即使他知道他们可能全军覆没，”普勒修正到。

sentences.english: The whole army is under the marshal's command.
The General Political Department administrates the army's Party work and organizes and conducts its political work.
sentences.chinese: 总政治部负责管理全军党的工作，组织进行政治工作。

definition: (in former times) upper, middle and lower army/army of right, center and left/(in modern times) the three armed services: Army, Navy and Air Force
to set out (of troops)/departure/start date (of military expedition)
